spec.name: Enso Restaurant
spec.description: Enso Restaurant is a specialized dining establishment in Casablanca, serving **Japanese cuisine**, often focusing on sushi, ramen, or other modern Japanese dishes. The name 'Enso' (a sacred circle in Zen Buddhism) suggests a focus on aesthetic perfection and simplicity, reflecting in its cuisine and likely its decor. Located in a high-end or prominent area of the city, it caters to an urban clientele seeking international, contemporary flavors and a sophisticated dining experience.
